attributes.action: Shorten January to 28 days and get it over with. Extend February by 3 days
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone hates January. You're broke. Its Cold. Its dark. January has a terrible reputation amongst months. Meanwhile February has a lot going for it. Evenings getting lighter, Valentines Day, Pancake Day, 6 Nations Rugby and the League Cup football Final.
There has clearly been an multi-century error.
Lets make January 28 days and get it over with whilst expending February to 31 days.
This error has gone on for too long and it is in our hands to correct it for future generations.
Lets work together for a happier winter.
